title: Implement workflows in Rust
description: Implement workflows.rs with same logic. Test with shared scenario files.
creator: Ryan Alyn Porter

comments.author: Ryan Alyn Porter
comments.text: Goal: implement workflow validation and side effects in Rust mirroring Python. Acceptance: functions validate_status_transition/get_workflow_for_issue_type/apply_transition_side_effects plus unit tests matching Python behavior and error messages.

comments.author: Ryan Alyn Porter
comments.text: Implemented Rust workflows module + tests, updated TaskulusError. Ran: cd rust && cargo test
